titleStmt.title: Foure sea-sermons, preached at the annuall meeting of the Trinitie Companie, in the parish church of Deptford: by Henry Valentine vicar
titleStmt.author: Valentine, Henry, d. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The last three leaves contain prayers to be used at sea.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet
